mapper.select: SELECT * FROM branchs WHERE branch_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{branchname}, '%')

SELECT b.branch_name AS branchName , COUNT(r.reservation_code) as reservationCode FROM reservations r LEFT JOIN branchs b ON r.rental_location = b.branch_code WHERE r.rental_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY b.branch_name order by reservationCode DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM branchs WHERE branch_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{branchName}, '%')
SELECT b.*, r.region_name FROM branchs b LEFT JOIN regions r ON b.region_code = r.region_code ORDER BY b.branch_code LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT * FROM branchs b LEFT JOIN regions r ON r.region_code = b.region_code WHERE b.branch_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{branchName}, '%') ORDER BY b.branch_code LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO branchs (branch_code, branch_name, branch_longitude, branch_latitude, region_code, post_code, branch_basic_address, branch_detailed_address, branch_phone_number, available_pickup_time, available_return_time, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{branchCode}, #{branchName}, #{branchLongitude}, #{branchLatitude}, #{regionCode}, #{postCode}, #{branchBasicAddress}, #{branchDetailedAddress}, #{branchPhoneNumber}, #{availablePickupTime},#{availableReturnTime}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT b.branch_code, b.branch_name, b.branch_longitude, b.branch_latitude, b.region_code, b.post_code, b.branch_basic_address, b.branch_detailed_address, b.branch_phone_number, b.available_pickup_time, b.available_return_time, b.created_at, b.updated_at, r.region_name -- regions 테이블에서 region_name도 조회 FROM Branchs b LEFT JOIN regions r ON b.region_code = r.region_code WHERE b.branch_code = #{branchCode}
